mobs.name: Patron
quips: Oh my, I drank too much.

mobs.name: Parishioner
quips: Great to see a new face here!
I hear there's going to be a good sermon on tea

mobs.name: Mom
quips: Your father would be so proud, were he here.

mobs.name: Peasant
quips: Why are you in my house?

mobs.name: Fisher
quips: I caught something, but it wasn't a fish!
